review_data.title: Pizza Nation
review_data.content: Pretty cool pizza joint! Paid around 10 bucks for a big slice of pepperoni. They accept crypto, and they have cool merchandise!

review_data.title: Delicious!
review_data.content: Delicious pizza and very welcome and friendly workers!! Bought the pizza for me and my dad and I can say that was the best pizza we ate while in Switzerland. I tried many ones and this one was above all!

review_data.title: Delicious pizza
review_data.content: Delicious pizza, great staff attitude. Highly recommended place. I would like to visit it again for sure . Although they didn't have a place to sit and eat, they recommended a nice place for us to sit.

review_data.title: Absolutely delicious pizza at a fantastic location.
review_data.content: This tiny pizza joint was almost right in front of my hotel, right by the river and Old Town. The two guys working there were SUPER friendly and spoke great English. I ordered a Buffalo mozzarella slice and was delighted with the flavor of the...More

review_data.title: Beste Pizza der Stadt
review_data.content: Die Pizza Slices sind genau richtig gross und in verschiedenen Varianten erhältlich. Man kann die Base jederzeit selbst bestimmen, der...More

review_data.title: Fantastic Pizza
review_data.content: I’m an American ex-pat who has been living in Zürich for over six years and this is far and away the best New York-style pizza I’ve found.

review_data.title: Amazing Experience
review_data.content: It was my first time in Pizza Nation, i had a amaaaazing experience because of their pizza with vegetarian offers, fast service and fair/good prices . Now it become one of my main spots to get this amazing pizza.

review_data.title: Lecker

review_data.title: MUST TRY💯🍕❤️

review_data.content: Den Punktabzug gibts nur weil man drinnen nicht sitzen und essen kann (Danke Bürokratie). Draussen kann man sitzen, aber halt...More

review_data.title: Nun ja ..

review_data.title: Excellent pizza, friendly owner and fun sodas
review_data.content: Best pizza I've had in a long time with vegetarian offers, fast service and fair/good prices for Zürich.

review_data.title: Pizza Perfection
review_data.content: English: Truly an incredible Pizza. Better than most, if not even all, that I've tried prior to this. The crust is a perfect combination between crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside. Check the place out if you need a quick snack, full...More

review_data.title: In Crust we Trust
review_data.content: Best Pizza in town! Sooo knusprig und genial. Belag ist Top und das Personal weiss genau was du brauchst.

review_data.title: The Best
review_data.content: Beste Pizza in ZH!! Personal sehr herzlich und nett. Pizza in den verrücktesten Variationen immer in Top Qualität

review_data.title: The pizza is delicious
review_data.content: I stopped by this small, hidden pizza joint in the Niederdorf. Pizza Nation is a walk-in, take-out eatery with no seating inside. On nice weather days, they may have sidewalk seating tables on the cobblestone sidewalk. The place sells pizza by the slice from 7-9CHF,...More

review_data.title: Best slices in town
review_data.content: This has become one of my main spots to get good food. The pizza slices are just amazing. Both the quality of the ingredients and the cooking are top notch, would absolutely recommend!

review_data.title: Super Pizza
review_data.content: Wohnen in der Nähe und haben mal vorbei geschaut, sehr lecker ein tolles Erlebnis auch die Getränkeauswahl die man nicht...More

review_data.title: Lunchtime
review_data.content: The owner is a pretty cool young guy. He sells a great product with a fantastic taste. If you stay in Zurich you have to visit him. One slice of pizza is quite big. You can select between 4 pizza types every day and choose...More

review_data.title: Best Pizza in Town
review_data.content: Definitiv die beste Pizza die ich in Zürich je gegessen habe. Würde es jedem weiterempfehlen! Super feine Pizza Slices und...More

review_data.title: Great new place
review_data.content: I regularly go into Zurich for a few days, en route to other locales in Switzerland. This time, I met the new owner of this little pizza joint, a very nice, enthusiastic young man. He offers a much appreciated, especially in overpriced ZRH, take away/quick...More

review_data.title: Phänomenal
review_data.content: Die Pizzas sind die besten in Zürich, kann ich nur weiterempfehlen. Ein absolutes Muss für Pizza-Fans. Super gelegen und freundliche...More

review_data.title: Great spot!
review_data.content: Really great pizza in the old town, nice spot to swing by and pick something up to go!! Very friendly and good service as well which is a plus :)

review_data.title: Frische Pizzaslices

review_data.title: Geil
review_data.content: Super Typ, super Essen, super Craft Beer, super Lage! Besuche diesen kleinen, unabhängigen und äusserst sympathischen Laden immer wieder gerne.

review_data.title: BEST IN TOWN
review_data.content: well, this tiny & authentic spot just opened 3 weeks ago and all I can say is, that Zurich maybe has many pizza places, but not one of them can keep up with Pizza Nation. The crust is as perfect as it gets, the ingredients...More

review_data.title: Very fresh and authentic pizza
review_data.content: Amazing pizza with fresh and authentic ingredients. Especially the dough is so delicious and light. Very recommended!
